quote: I had a great experience working with Thushara. She was super responsive, quick to accommodate a tight delivery schedule, and understood the brand requirements. I can't recommend her enough!
author: Adriana

quote: Thushara is a design pro! She created gorgeous templates that complemented my brand and specifications perfectly. Her communication was on point throughout the job.
author: Ranjni

quote: Thushara is a wonderful person to talk to! She mentioned being the sole designer at her company, and our conversation clearly showed her determination in steering her own career, which requires a lot of energy and initiative. She has attitude to be a great professional.
author: Mariana Perez (Mentor)
